#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MAX 200001
void flush()
{
     int ch=0;
     while((ch=getchar())=='\n' && ch!=EOF);
}
int main()
{
    int t=0,i=0;
    char x[MAX]={0};
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif // ONLINE_JUDGE
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
        {
            flush();
            gets(x);
            int n=strlen(x);
            int k=0;
            int counter=0;
            for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            {
                    if(x[i]==32)
                    {
                        counter++;
                        continue;
                    }
            }
            cout<<counter+1<<endl;
        }
}
